general_gameUpdBoxText1: There {beDays} left until the next major update of {game}. Hit Confirm to open official launcher and pre-download.
general_gameUpdBoxText2: It's been {days} since the major update of {game}. Hit Confirm to open official launcher and download.
general_gameUpdBoxText3: A major update of {game} has been released today. Hit Confirm to open official launcher and pre-download.
updDialog_footerText: Hit Confirm to download via browser.
